page.title: 11POPULATION GROWTH ON SCORAIG
page.content: SCORAIG PENINSULA IS UNUSUAL--ALL THE PEOPLE ARE INCOMERS. 20 YEARS AGO THE LAST INDIGENOUS CROFTING FOLK LEFT.BY THEN THERE WERE 2 CROFTS WORKED BY IN- COMERS AND GRADUALLY NEW FAMILIES MOVED IN.THERE ARE NOW OVER A DOZEN HOUSEHOLDS.THE NEWCOMERS HAVE WIDELY DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS,SOME WITH AGRIC- ULTURAL/HORTICULTURAL EXPERIENCE,SOME WILLING TO LEARN NEW SKILLS IN SMALL INDUSTRY,CRAFTS OR CROFTING.A LARGE PROPORTION ARE QUALIFIED IN SOME FORM OF HIGHER EDUCATION. SCORAIG IS A VERY YOUNG COMMUNITY. THE AGE SPAN IS FROM NEW-BORN TO 55yrs THE AVERAGE AGE IS 25. AFTER 20yrs THE NEW CROFTERS ARE ENTERING THE SECOND GENERATION. ALREADY SOME YOUNG PEOPLE RAISED ON SCORAIG HAVE CHOSEN TO LIVE AND WORK THERE.IN 1986 THE FIRST CHILD OF A SCORAIG FORMER PUPIL WILL START SCHOOL.
